name: Gallery by Atahan Tuğra Kiltan
description:
New Update: Version 0.1.0

  • Better/In-game Image Importing

The Gallery is a sandbox virtual image gallery through which you can load and display your own images.

The aim is to create a relaxing atmosphere for the player to do something different for some time.

The Gallery is finished with its main functionality, but will continue with bigger updates as many parts are refined, modified or expanded.

The current goal is refinement of existing content and new content.
